import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Chart from './Chart' import Table from './reportTable' function DailyReport({Editdat}) { const [reportdata, setReport] = useState([]); const [todayreport, settodayreport] = useState({ reportdate: '', Client: '', startEnd: '', Totalhrs: '', status: '', }); const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); // Track editing state const [editId, setEditId] = useState(null); // Track the ID of the report being edited const handlechange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; settodayreport((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value, })); }; const submitForm = () => { if (isEditing) { editReport(todayreport); // If editing, call editReport } else { submitReport(todayreport); // Otherwise, submit new report } }; useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:8000/testapi/v1/dailyreport') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((res) => setReport(res.data)) .catch((error) => console.error('Error fetching report data:', error)); }, []); // Empty dependency array so this runs once on mount const submitReport = (todayreport) => { fetch('http://localhost:8000/testapi/v1/dailyreport/today', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(todayreport), }) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { console.log('Report submitted successfully:', data); setReport((reportdata) => [...reportdata, data]); alert('Report is Submitted'); window.location.reload(); }) .catch((error) => console.error('Error submitting report:', error)); }; const editReport = (todayreport) => { fetch(`http://localhost:8000/testapi/v1/dailyreport/${editId}`, { method: 'PUT', // Use PUT method for updating headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(todayreport), }) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { console.log('Report updated successfully:', data); const updatedReports = reportdata.map((report) => report._id === editId ? data : report ); setReport(updatedReports); setIsEditing(false); // Reset editing state setEditId(null); alert('Report is Updated'); window.location.reload(); }) .catch((error) => console.error('Error updating report:', error)); }; const handleEditClick = (report) => { setIsEditing(true); setEditId(report._id); settodayreport({ reportdate: report.reportdate, Client: report.Client, startEnd: report.startEnd, Totalhrs: report.Totalhrs, status: report.status, }); }; return (
